user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my sister and I want to create a deck of cards with personalized messages on each card. Can you fetch me all the cards with their names, numbers, meanings, and images? Also, provide me with a random joke to add some humor to the messages.

TaskList.description: Fetch all available playing cards including their names, numbers, meanings, and images.
Retrieve a random joke to include in the personalized messages.
Combine the fetched card details and the random joke to create personalized messages.
